original_text: By this time it was late in the day, so his disciples came to him. “This is a remote place,” they said, “and it’s already very late.
korean_text: 때가 저물어가매 제자들이 예수께 나아와 여짜오되 이 곳은 빈 들이요 날도 저물어가니

sentences.original_text: By this time it was late in the day
so his disciples came to him
"This is a remote place," they said
